title: Remove footer attribution line from shared layout

requirements.summary: Remove the HeartSync/caffeine.ai attribution line (including heart icon and link) from the shared footer while keeping the “Created by Angelica Arboleda” line.
acceptanceCriteria: Across all app screens that use the shared layout, the footer no longer displays any text similar to “© 2026 HeartSync. Built with … using caffeine.ai”.
The footer no longer renders the caffeine.ai outbound link.
The footer still renders the text “Created by Angelica Arboleda” in the footer.

file_operations.description: Update the shared footer markup to remove the entire attribution paragraph that includes the dynamic © year, the Heart icon, and the outbound caffeine.ai link, while leaving the existing “Created by Angelica Arboleda” footer line intact.
